disasters.title: Forest Fire near Dilijan
disasters.description: Large forest fire detected in the mountains near Dilijan National Park. Strong winds are spreading the fire rapidly.
safetyInstructions: Cover your mouth with cloth
Avoid smoke, move towards the nearest safe exit
Do not use elevators during evacuation
Follow local emergency services instructions

disasters.title: Magnitude 4.2 Earthquake
disasters.description: Moderate earthquake registered near Ararat. Some buildings reported minor damage.
safetyInstructions: Do not use elevators
Hide under a sturdy table or go to an open area
Stay away from windows and heavy objects
If outdoors, stay away from buildings

disasters.title: Flash Flood Warning
disasters.description: Heavy rainfall has caused flash flooding in several villages. Water levels rising rapidly.
safetyInstructions: Move to higher ground immediately
Avoid walking through moving water
Do not drive through flooded roads
Stay indoors until water recedes

disasters.title: Landslide Risk Alert
disasters.description: Unstable slopes detected after recent heavy rains. Road closures in effect.
safetyInstructions: Move away from slopes and hillsides
Seek shelter in safe, stable areas
Avoid valleys and low-lying areas
Listen for unusual sounds from slopes

disasters.title: Industrial Fire
disasters.description: Small industrial fire contained by emergency services. Smoke visible in surrounding area.
safetyInstructions: Avoid the immediate area
Keep windows closed if smoke is visible
Follow evacuation routes if instructed
Do not approach the site
